fields.value: Foreign-born Population in Boston Area Communities, 1870–2010

dsDescriptionValue.value: This dataset underlies a choropleth map of Boston area communities in which areas are shaded according to the percentage of the population that was foreign-born during each decade. The data was drawn from the US Census of Population, as well as the American Community Survey.

value: Arts and Humanities

publicationCitation.value: Johnson, Marilynn S. “Immigrant Settlement in Greater Boston.” Global Boston (blog), April 9, 2018. https://globalboston.bc.edu/index.php/interactive-map-1870-2010.

value: English
Tabular data
animated GIF on Immigrant Places page of Global Boston website
interactive map on Tableau Public

US Census Bureau, American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates, 2008–2012, for select Massachusetts places (used as data for 2010), generated by Marilynn S. Johnson using American FactFinder (2017).

fields.value: Unless otherwise noted, data is drawn from historical print volumes digitized by the U.S. Census Bureau and made available online in PDF format. Some towns calculated via census tracts.
